headline: Does Colgate-Palmolive’s (CL) Predictable Earnings Outlook Reveal Strength or Strategic Limits?
summary: Colgate-Palmolive is set to announce its third-quarter 2025 earnings, drawing market attention after previously exceeding analyst revenue expectations and maintaining steady financial results amid a competitive consumer products landscape. Analyst coverage highlights the stock's predictability and attractiveness to options traders seeking less volatile investments, further fueling investor interest ahead of the earnings release. headline: Chevron, Exxon Mobil, Colgate-Palmolive - Earnings
summary: Energy giant Chevron (CVX) reports a strong beat, rivals Exxon Mobil (XOM) deals with mixed results after a dip in free cash flow and Colgate-Palmolive (CL) sits flat after missing its organic sales estimate. For more live coverage of markets watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and head to Yahoo Finance.

headline: Colgate-Palmolive lowers full-year sales outlook, Q3 earnings top estimates
summary: Investing.com -- Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) reported third-quarter earnings that exceeded analyst expectations on Wednesday, with adjusted earnings per share of $0.91, topping the consensus estimate of $0.89. The consumer products giant saw its stock edge up 1% following the announcement.

The consumer products giant saw its stock edge up 1% following the announcement.

headline: Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) Reports Q3 In Line With Expectations
summary: Consumer products company Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 1.9% year on year to $5.13 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.91 per share was 2.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Colgate-Palmolive: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: NEW YORK (AP) — Colgate-Palmolive Co. (CL) on Friday reported third-quarter profit of $735 million. On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had net income of 91 cents. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Colgate-Palmolive: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: NEW YORK (AP) — Colgate-Palmolive Co. (CL) on Friday reported third-quarter profit of $735 million. On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had net income of 91 cents. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

headline: Exxon Mobil, Berkshire Earnings and Fed Speakers: Still to Come This Week
summary: Investors will tune into earnings from oil majors Chevron and Exxon Mobil on Friday. Here’s what to watch for: Today   Earnings: AbbVie, Chevron (read more), Colgate-Palmolive, Exxon Mobil.   Federal Reserve speakers: Lorie Logan, Beth Hammack and Raphael Bostic are due to speak at a conference on bank funding in Dallas.
